notes.text: Note that the spelling is publicly, ending with the suffix -ly, not publically

definitions: so as to be seen by other people; in public

definitions: used in reference to views expressed to others and not necessarily genuinely felt

examples.text: publicly, officials criticized the resolution, but privately they thought it tolerable
